001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.json.encoder;
002
003import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
004import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder;
005import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder.EncoderProvider;
006import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProvider;
007import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProviderRef;
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
009import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator;
010import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
011
012/**
013 * Adds <a href="https://go2docs.graylog.org/5-2/getting_in_log_data/gelf.html">GELF
014 * JSON</a> Encoder to encoder registry with {@value GelfEncoder#GELF_SCHEME} URI scheme.
015 */
016@ServiceProvider(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class)
017public class GelfEncoderConfigurator implements Configurator {
018
019        /**
020         * Default constructor for service loader.
021         */
022        public GelfEncoderConfigurator() {
023        }
024
025        @Override
026        public boolean configure(LogConfig config, Pass pass) {
027                config.encoderRegistry().register(GelfEncoder.GELF_SCHEME, new GelfEncoderProvider());
028                return true;
029        }
030
031        private static class GelfEncoderProvider implements EncoderProvider {
032
033                @Override
034                public LogProvider<LogEncoder> provide(LogProviderRef ref) {
035                        return (name, c) -> {
036                                var uri = ref.uri();
037                                GelfEncoderBuilder b = new GelfEncoderBuilder(name);
038                                String host = uri.getHost();
039                                if (host != null) {
040                                        b.host(host);
041                                }
042                                b.fromProperties(c.properties(), ref);
043                                return b.build();
044                        };
045                }
046
047        }
048
049}
